main event: A bright light was observed in the sky over Sidney, Ohio on 21 September 1962.
interesting points: The light was described as being as bright as the brightest star and the size of a dime at arm's length,The observation lasted for 60-90 seconds,The light appeared bulb-shaped, without any trail or sound,Two witnesses reported seeing the object,There was a possible conclusion that the light could be a rare type of object.
witness description: Two observers, including a trained observer.
